subject: Get paid to spend time with your kids. Are we nuts?
body:
13 People Needed Immediately!

We're Looking For 13 People Who Want To Earn . . .

--> up to $3,450+/month PART time
--> up to $7,600+/month FULL time

Online Business Systems is expanding AGAIN -- and 
we have a special invitation for you!
Visit here 
Get Ready... Get Set... GO! 

Build an International business from your living room.

Imagine -- all the time you need to do the things 
you really want! Live freely without financial 
fears holding you back. Eliminate the pressure of 
day to day living and build your work schedule 
around your personal goals and desires.

13 People Needed Immediately! 

Not too long ago, you visited our site looking for 
a legitimate opportunity to make serious income 
...from home. At the time, our Decision Pack (a 
loaded Work-At-Home Kit containing more than 3 
hours of solid business information) cost $49.98 
to order.

TODAY - you can get it F-REE!

If you're serious and ready to transform 
your life, then this invitation is for YOU!

Today -- and for the next 24 hours -- you can 
Get Your Decision Pack F*R*E*E Through This Special Link: 
Visit here 




...all you pay is the small $9.95 shipping and handling.

Hurry ...13 openings won't last long! 

Our Business Coaches are standing by, ready to help 
you design your new future -- today.

Get Your Kit Immediately and qualify to be one of 
the 13 people who step up to be the next success 
story here at Online Business Systems.

Don't miss out! Get it now:



Our Story . . . 

Before we were introduced to this business, 
we had spent 25 years working hard for 
someone else. We racked up our c_redit cards, 
re-mortgaged our house a few times and were 
living pay check to pay check. 

We both were working full time; often more 
than 40 hours a week; and we hardly ever seemed 
to have enough family time. We have four 
teenagers and we were worried about how we 
were going to pay for clothes, cars and college.

We knew that if we were ever going to get 
out from under our mountain of debt, set 
our own hours, and take charge of our 
financial future, our best option was to 
build our own business based from our home. 

So about a year ago, we learned about this 
business opportunity and we decided to check 
it out.

With the help of our business coach, we earned 
an extra $600 in our first month working part 
time. By our third month, we earned more than 
$1,500 and now we're consistently earning 
more than $4,000 a month part time! 

Now we work our business around our family's 
schedule and our earnings continue to grow.

It took courage to step out of our comfort 
zone and look for a way out of the rat race. 

And we're so glad we did! We're now building 
a solid financial wall around our family and 
we look forward to our days of living a life 
that we hadn't ever dreamed possible.

Karen and Curt
Wisconsin


Avoid further deliveries of this message by following this web address:

98230
